patthana8.59:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:5.1: Nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:6.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca nanadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
